resources.string: Please refer to the attached APP for module precautions.
Hide the status bar in task view
Turn off the darkening of the task view wallpaper
The distance between the icon and the app name
Allow moving classic widgets to be moved to the minus screen
Allow MIUI widgets to be displayed in classic widgets
Hide APP icon in the task view
Hide clean up icon in task view
Hide the small window icon in the task view
Size of text in the task view
Thumbnail size for vertical task view
Thumbnail size of horizontal task view
Always show the status bar clock
The blur level of the task view is set to

It is detected that you are using this module for the first time, the module will set the default value, and then restart System Launcher.\nIf you need further settings, please wait for the System launcher to restart and open the \"Home screen\" settings again.
System launcher will restart in 2 seconds
The entered value will be divided by
Please enter a value within the allowable range!

Please activate this module in the LSPosed Manager and restart the MIUI Launcher once.\nThe module settings are in the settings of the Home screen!\nSpecific location: Settings - Home screen - Where the \"Default launcher\" used to be.

Notice:
1.This module currently only support LSPosed 5606 or above, it does not going to support any other Xposed frameworks at present.

2.If you have problem with module activate, follow the opinions below: re-optimize System Launcher - disable this module - enable this module - force stop System Launcher.

3.When some options are invalid, please check whether the System Launcher you installed is the latest ALPHA version. If so, please try to re-optimize System Launcher in LSPosed and restart it.

4.The final effect depends on your SoC, MIUI version, launcher version and so on. Please refer to the actual performance.
Hook for MIUI Launcher.\nThe module settings are in the settings of the \"Home screen\"!
